reasoning: Periosteal osteosarcoma is a rare variant arising from the periosteum. Estimated incidence 0.1-0.2 per 100k per year based on bone tumor registries, representing 5-15% of all osteosarcomas. Age-dependent with peak incidence in adolescents.
source: Mirabello L et al. (2009). International osteosarcoma incidence patterns in children and adolescents. Int J Cancer. 125(1):229-234
